title: Istanbul Besiktas: Stadium blast captured on TV
description: The moment a blast rocked Istanbul's Besiktas football stadium was caught on a club TV broadcast.

title: Istanbul stadium attacks: Kurdish TAK group claim attacks
description: Kurdish TAK militants say they carried out an attack that killed 38 people near an Istanbul stadium.

title: Qantas to fly from London to Australia non-stop
description: Passengers will be able to fly from the UK to Australia non-stop from March 2018, says airline Qantas.

title: Palmyra: Fierce battle for ancient Syrian city
description: Control of the ancient Syrian city of Palmyra goes back and forth between government forces and IS.

title: Boris Johnson encourages 'candour' in UK-Saudi relations
description: Boris Johnson says there is "candour" in the UK's relationship with Saudi Arabia.

title: Cairo bombing: Cairo Coptic Christian complex hit
description: A bomb explosion in the Coptic Christian cathedral complex in Egypt's capital kills at least 25.

title: Donald Trump rejects CIA Russia hacking report
description: Donald Trump says a CIA conclusion that Russian hackers tried to help him win the election is "ridiculous".

title: Dario Gradi: Crewe Alexandra director suspended pending FA investigation
description: Crewe director Dario Gradi is suspended pending an FA investigation into claims he "smoothed over" a complaint of sexual assault in the 1970s.

title: Pogba hits Spurs woodwork, Boufal strikes for Saints
description: Can Spurs hit the top four? Text updates and analysis on a busy day of action as Man Utd host Spurs and Boro play at Southampton.
